metadata.name: ChartConfig
metadata.description: A type definition that specifies the configuration for chart components. It represents a record where each key maps to an object containing optional label and icon properties, along with either a color string or a theme object that maps theme names to colors. This configuration is used to customize the appearance and labeling of chart elements.

definition.name: ChartContainer
definition.description: A wrapper component that provides a responsive container for Recharts charts. It manages the chart context and applies consistent styling across different chart types.

config.description: Configuration object for the chart following ChartConfig type

children.description: Chart components to be rendered inside the container

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the container

definition.visualLayout: A responsive container that wraps chart components and provides consistent styling and theming support. It maintains aspect-video ratio and includes customizable styling for various chart elements like axes, grids, and tooltips.

definition.name: ChartStyle
definition.description: An internal component that generates and injects CSS variables for chart theming based on the provided configuration.

definition.name: ChartTooltip
definition.description: A re-export of the Recharts Tooltip component for displaying chart tooltips.

properties.description: Inherits all properties from Recharts Tooltip component

definition.name: ChartTooltipContent
definition.description: A customizable tooltip content component that displays detailed information about chart data points with support for custom formatting and styling.

hideLabel.description: Whether to hide the tooltip label

hideIndicator.description: Whether to hide the color indicator

nameKey.description: Key to use for item names

definition.visualLayout: A floating card with a border that displays the data point label, value, and optional color indicators. Supports multiple data points and custom formatting.

definition.name: ChartLegend
definition.description: A re-export of the Recharts Legend component for displaying chart legends.

properties.description: Inherits all properties from Recharts Legend component

definition.name: ChartLegendContent
definition.description: A customizable legend content component that displays chart legend items with optional icons and custom styling.

hideIcon.description: Whether to hide the legend item icons

nameKey.description: Key to use for identifying legend items

definition.visualLayout: A horizontal list of legend items, each containing an optional icon and label. Items are centered and can be aligned to the top or bottom of the chart.
